item.title: Airbnb's Coolest Tiny Houses in America
item.description:
Airbnb's Coolest Tiny Houses in America

Tiny homes are all the rage, so it makes perfect sense that tiny homes people list on Airbnb are also quite popular. And that's…

item.title: Cooling off: TWIG brings Japanese-style cold brewing to London
item.description:
Cooling off: TWIG brings Japanese-style cold brewing to London

When self-proclaimed tea fanatic and yoga teacher Iona Carter travelled to Kanazawa, Japan last year, something about their brews seemed extra cool. A local specialty, the process of cold brewing tea inspired Carter to launch her own London-based company, TWIG Teas.

item.title: Projections in the Forest
item.description:
Projections in the Forest

Behind the scenes: http://vimeo.com/3hund/behindthescenes The projection mapping "bioluminescent forest" is made by artists Friedrich van Schoor and Tarek Mawad. The artists spent six weeks in the forest fascinated by the silence and natural occurrences in nature, especially the phenomenon "bioluminescence".

item.title: Colossal
item.description:
Colossal

Commercial photographer Sam Kaplan 's latest project, transforms sticks of chewing gum into monumental structures, stacking the sticky treat in shapes that imitate architectural forms. Hundreds of pieces of gum criss cross and stand upwards to create pyramids, columns, and arches-held tightly together with support from super glue.

item.title: Best of CH 2015: Instagram
item.description:
Best of CH 2015: Instagram

Four and a half years ago we joined Instagram and have posted over 2,500 images since. More than 99% of the photographs we share, we ourselves have taken, and that's something we're quite proud of.

item.title: BioLite PowerLight Mini
item.description:
BioLite PowerLight Mini

BioLite became leaders in the cooking and charging market thanks to their nifty wood burning CampStove (with portable grill) that generates electricity. For 2016, they now offer a lighter, battery-powered version called the CookStove for those who want an easy-to-start campfire but don't need the added perk of device-charging.

item.title: Underwater Dogs: photographs of dogs underwater by Seth Casteel
item.description:
Underwater Dogs: photographs of dogs underwater by Seth Casteel

Underwater Dogs - a book containing over 80 unique photographs of dogs underwater snapped by animal photographer Seth Casteel is published on 25th October 2012 by Headline Books, priced £14.99.

item.title: Reduced Spoke Bicycles : Conceptual Bike
item.description:
Reduced Spoke Bicycles : Conceptual Bike

Conceptual Bike - Ion Lucin has simplified the design of a standard two-wheeler with his conceptual bike Baik that opts for three-spoked wheels, a limited use of lin...

item.title: Why Sleep Is So Important For Overall Health
item.description:
Why Sleep Is So Important For Overall Health

Around the world, human beings have sleep deficit. Learn why getting the right amount of rest can revitalize your body and lead to overall increase in health and wellness. With an estimated 60 million Americans suffering from insomnia, sleep is something many of us are lacking.

item.title: Drink to Dublin: Jameson enlist artist James Earley to design new label.
item.description:
Drink to Dublin: Jameson enlist artist James Earley to design new label.

Any visitor to Dublin's fair city will quickly sense the iconic presence of Jameson whiskey, which is woven into the fabric of life in Ireland's capital. The brand began producing whiskey in Dublin in 1780, and has always been closely linked with the city's rich cultural scene, championing its music, literature, and art.
